arduino.arduinocom

Class Arduino.ThreadSafePipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduino.arduinocom.Arduino.ThreadSafePipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Arduino

    private class Arduino.ThreadSafePipe
extends Object
implements Runnable
    A class that has a thread to read from a piped input stream.
    Author:
    Jacob Glueck
